channel.title: Posts on Johannes Demel
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Johannes Demel

item.title: Does a github.io page work for me?
item.description: Here we go. I try to start my own website to write about things that are on my mind. Maybe this website will just hold links to all the work I did, e.g. publications.
item.content: Here we go. I try to start my own website to write about things that are on my mind. Maybe this website will just hold links to all the work I did, e.g. publications.
